name: we need a boat
description: Every day I travel 20 km through the kopo road to the office, which is located in downtown Bandung, I walk down the road using a motorcycle. Every heavy rainfalls for a long time, the road is often flooded, because the river that passes through the road overflows and inundates the road as high as about 70 cm, so that motorcyclists can not pass the road it can cause the motor engine to die. This problem has been going on for a long time, but there is no improvement from the local government, maybe we as south Bandung people, who routinely pass the road need a boat to pass through the road, if heavy rainfalls.
